name: editables
description: HTML content builder interface built in JavaScript

scripts.dev-styles: cd assets && npm install && bower instal && gulp dev
scripts.build-styles: cd assets && npm install && bower install && gulp build
scripts.dev: npm run dev-script & npm run dev-styles
scripts.build: npm run build-script & npm run build-styles

author: Florent Schildknecht <contact@florentschildknecht.com>
